name: Save the world (itch)
description:
When my 11-year old brother came to me that he wants to become a game developer, i had to explain to him that you can't make a game like pubg or fortnite in a matter of days. But we found something, where he could participate in a team and make a game within 3 days!

My brother made all the decisions for this game, he had to think about the theme, how to implend that and what everyone does

Together with a team of experienced people, we managed to make a small game, and my brother approved of the product that came out of this jam.

The team:
Jayisdebeste - my brother / idea man
Shadow6390 (Diogo) - Game designer / programmer
Fresh Food - Artist
ComputerFiguur - Holding the team together and some small assets

Engine: Game Maker Studio 1.4

Contains music ©2018 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International
